availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Born in 1845 in Virginia. Attorney. Married with two children James and Bushrod. Mayor of Covington 1845-1860. Police guard of Kentucky Central Railroad September 17, 1861-December 10, 1861. Died in 1867.

bibl.p: “Covington Mayors.” December 30, 2013. http://www.kentonlibrary.org/genealogy/regional-history/covington/downtown/covington-mayors; Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860) 4th Ward Covington City; A. G. Hodges, Reports Communicated to Both Branches of the Legislature of Kentucky at the December Session, 1845 (Frankfort, Kentucky: A.G. Hodges State Printer, 1845); Roger D. Hunt Colonels in Blue: Indiana, Kentucky, and Tennessee: A Civil War Biographical Dictionary (New York, NY, United States: McFarland & Company, Inc., Publishers, 2013.)
